TUTORIAL_SLIDE1_TITLE: Welcome to the Ionic Super Starter
TUTORIAL_SLIDE1_DESCRIPTION: The Ionic Super Starter is a fully-featured Ionic starter with many pre-built pages and best practices.
TUTORIAL_SLIDE2_TITLE: How to use the Super Starter
TUTORIAL_SLIDE2_DESCRIPTION: Assemble the various page types you want and remove the ones you don't. We've provided many common mobile app page layouts, like login and signup pages, tabs, and this tutorial page.
TUTORIAL_SLIDE3_DESCRIPTION: Need help? Check out the Super Starter README for a full tutorial
WELCOME_INTRO: The starting point for your next great Ionic app
LOGIN_ERROR: Unable to sign in. Please check your account information and try again.
WRONG_PASSWORD: Oh No!, It seems like you used a wrong password for the login.
SIGNUP_ERROR: Unable to create account. Please check your account information and try again.
REGISTER_LABEL: Want to save the world ? Register now.
REGISTER_ERROR: Ooops there was an error, please try again
SUCCESSFUL_REGISTER: We sent you an email to welcome you in our community. Use the Link in the email to activate your account and then it is time to share the food!
ALREADY_IN_USE: Oh It looks like your email is already registered as an active Savooder
EMAILREQ: We need your email address to reach you concerning the world's status
EMAILINVALID: Your email address needs to be in a valid format. Otherwise we can't reach you, when the world needs you!
CONFIRMPASS: To get rid of annoying typos, we need you to confirm your new password.
AREEQUAL: Ooops, your passwords do not match eachother. But don't panic, you can give it another try.
PASSREQ: We need you to have password, because otherwise people will come and your career as an hero will suffer.
PASSMINLEN: To be sure about your heroism we need you to have an password with more than 4 letters.
SEARCH_PLACEHOLDER: Search the items list, e.g. "Donald Duck"
PASSWORD_RESET_FAIL: There was a happy little accident. Please try again
PASSWORD_RESET_NO_USER: There is no user with this email

SETTINGS.TITLE: My Savood
SETTINGS.NO_BADGES_1: You don't have any badges yet.

DELETE.TITLE: Wenn du dein Offering wirklich löschen willst, dann schreib 'Ja, ich will!
DELETE.WRONG_TEXT: Ups das hat leider nicht geklappt.

SLIDE_1_INTROTEXT: Congrats! Now you can start saving the world
SLIDE_2_INFOTEXT: To save food it is necessary to introduce yourself to the community.
NAME: Firstname
SLIDE_4_INFOTEXT: Now you can add a little description about yourself.
SLIDE_5_INFOTEXT: Now you can give us your phonenumber to get in touch with other Savooders.
SLIDE_6_INFOTEXT: At last you can enter a default address for your Offerings.
SLIDE_7_INFOTEXT: We wish you good luck for saving our food and world!
CREATE_USER_SUCCESS: Now it is done! You can personalise your profile under the settings tab
MAP_LOADING: One Second, we are just distributing the offerings...
OFFERINGS_LOADING: Our detectors are looking for lonely food...

BADGES.OFFERING_1: Saved the world for the first time!

UNSAVOOD_TITLE: If you really want to revoke your savood, write: 'Yes, I do!
UNSAVOOD_WRONG_TEXT: It looks like you are not sure enough
DELETE_OFFERING_TITLE: If you really want to delete your offering, write: 'Yes, I do!
DELETE_OFFERING_WRONG_TEXT: It looks like you are not sure enough
